channel.title: Help Me Identify, pl0x
channel.description:
Does somebody know what SRL procedure or function that Writeln's all the people that are talking's, usernames. Because it's annoying. Like pretend I talked. The debug would be looking like this.
WhiteShadow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow White adow + 5 more
I scanned my script (using ctrl + f) and none of my Writeln's said to debug names.

item.title: Help Me Identify, pl0x
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

function SaveToChatLog: Boolean;

begin
OldLine := TheLine;
TheName := lowercase(trim(GetTextAtEx(20, 415, 45, SmallChars, False, False, 0, 2, 0, 40, True, tr_NormalChars)));
TheLine := lowercase(trim(GetTextAtEx(20, 415, 45, SmallChars, False, False, 0, 2, 16711680, 40, False, tr_NormalChars)));
NewLine := TheLine;
if OldLine <> NewLine then
if (pos(‘yo’, TheName) <> 0) then
begin
end
else
if WriteFileString(TheFile,TheTime+’ '+ TheName + ‘’ + TheLine + chr(13)) then
Result := True
else
Result := False;
end;

No Writeln here. ;\

Read full topic
